name: Harry Potter Unity (Prototype)
description:
As the name implies, was doing this as a sorta interview project for a game dev company, sadly the prototype didn't get me the job due to someone with more experience and i left a lot unfinished since I only had 2 weeks. Oh well, for now, it's just something I thought peeps might like even if it's only a buggy as hell prototype, for more info about the game and such click the "Dev Log" button in the main menu to get a complete overview of the project in a .rtf file, hope you'll like it.

[Controls]

W A S & D: Movement controls

LMouse: Aiming and casting spells.

Tab: Open ingame inventory.

Esc: Go to main menu.

F1: Toggle multiplayer chat.

[NOTICE]: Requires internet access since it's a multiplayer prototype, expect tons of bugs and issues since it was a rapid quick prototype within 2 weeks for a game dev interview position.

Not sure if I'll keep working on this, might do it here and there for funsies but if yall really like the idea might try and get something up and running that's more reminiscent of a demo prototype.
